code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import userSlice from"./userSlice";import notesSlice from"./notesSlice";const userInfoFromStorage=localStorage.getItem('userInfo')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userInfo')):null;const store=configureStore({reducer:{user:userSlice,notes:notesSlice},preloadedState:{user:{userInfo:userInfoFromStorage}}});export default store;
